name: Dullahan
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.Headless Summoning (Recharges after a Sh: If the dullahan is reduced to 0 hit points, it doesn't die or fall unconscious. Instead, it regains 97 hit points. In addition, it summons three death's heads, one of each type, in unoccupied spaces within 5 feet of it. The death's heads are under the dullahan's control and act immediately after the dullahan in the initiative order. Additionally, the dullahan can now use the options in the "Mythic Actions" section. Award a party an additional 5,900 XP (11,800 XP total) for defeating the dullahan after it uses Headless Summoning.
traits.Legendary Resistance (2/Day): If the dullahan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
traits.Unusual Nature: The dullahan doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.Battleaxe: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d8 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands, plus 11 (2d10) necrotic damage. If the dullahan scores a critical hit against a creature, the target must succeed on a DC 15+1d8 + 11 Constitution saving throw or the dullahan cuts off the target's head. The target dies if it can't survive without the lost head. A creature that doesn't have or need a head, or has legendary actions, instead takes an extra 27 (6d8) slashing damage.
actions.Fiery Skull: Ranged Spell Attack: +7+1d8 + 3 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) fire damage.

options.Frightful Presence (Costs 2 Actions): Each creature of the dullahan's choice within 30 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15+1d8 + 11 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of the dullahan until the end of its next turn.
options.Head Hunt (Costs 3 Actions): The dullahan moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks and makes one Battleaxe attack with advantage. If the attack hits, but is not a critical hit, the attack deals an extra 27 (6d8) necrotic damage.
